title: Effect of increase in the price level

content.prompt: An increase in the price level will most likely cause which of the following?

choices.label: A leftward shift of the aggregate demand curve
An increase in the demand for money
An increase in the real interest rate
A decrease in the nominal interest rate
An increase in the supply of money

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
